title: 康軒國中英語 B3L9 Reading 動畫

json.text: Having Fun in the Big Apple
Every year, my family takes a trip to a different country.
This year, we chose to visit the USA.
We arrived in New York City yesterday, January 23rd.
We took the subway to our hotel.
After we checked in, we went to Times Square on foot.
In many people's eyes, it is the heart of the city.
There are many theaters in and around Times Square,
and we saw The Lion King there.
This morning, we rode bicycles to the Brooklyn Bridge.
On the way there, we enjoyed many beautiful sights.
I will never forget them even in the far future.
Tomorrow, we are going to have a museum day.
In the morning, we will take a bus to the Met.
There are many wonderful works of art there,
and I really want to see Monet's and Picasso's paintings.
In the afternoon, we will visit the American Museum of Natural History.
It was the setting for the successful movie, Night at the Museum.
Perhaps I will get museum feet after walking around these places all day,
but I will learn a lot for sure.
